1.title: Premiere
1.plot: In this series, based on the popular US series of the same name, a bachelor will find his girlfriend in a group of 25 female candidates. The main male character will learn about the girls through each episode, through the events and social activities offered by the program. At the end of each episode, the girls will receive a rose from the male lead, symbolizing being able to stay in the competition. Meanwhile, girls who do not receive roses will have to leave.

imdb.title: The Bachelor: Vietnam
plot: A single bachelor dates multiple women over several weeks, narrowing them down to hopefully find his true love.
